name: Kernel-pult
tooltip: Flings corn kernels and butter at zombies

name: Snapdragon
tooltip: Breathes fire in an area in front of it

name: Spikeweed
tooltip: Breaks 1 rolling object, hurts zombies that step on it

name: Spring Bean
tooltip: Bounces zombies back and into nearby water

name: Coconut Cannon
tooltip: Tap on the cannon to fire an explosive coconut

name: Spikerock
tooltip: Breaks 3 rolling objects, hurts zombies that step on it

name: Cherry Bomb
tooltip: Blows up all zombies in a medium area

name: Power Lily
tooltip: Creates one Plant Food for use
